root.name: Sneak 'n Peek
root.description: OverviewIn this game, either 1 or 2 players play a game of Hide 'N' Seek. One player hides his icon while the other player attempts to find him. There are four rooms a follows:OutsideThe Orange BedroomThe Red BedroomThe living room.Outside, players can hide on the left or right sides of the house.In the Red Bedroom, players can hide either under the bed or in the closetIn the Orange Bedroom, players can hide under the bedIn the Living Room, players hide behind the couch. ReproductionsRetroZone published and KHAN Games developed a reproduction with 8-Bit graphics for the NES
